Package solver.constraints.nary.sum

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PropBoolSumCoarse
    Constraint that state that the sum of boolean variables vars is equal to the integer variable sum
    PropBoolSumIncremental
    Constraint that state that the sum of boolean variables vars is equal to the integer variable sum Works incrementally in O(1) per instantiation event
    PropScalarEq
    A propagator for SUM(x_i) = b
    Based on "Bounds Consistency Techniques for Long Linear Constraint"
    W.
    PropSumEq
    A propagator for SUM(x_i) = y
    Scalar

    Bounds Consistency Techniques for Long Linear Constraint"
    W.
